Tags

The Tags contains all the OPC tags to read and write.

What do you want to do?

Add Tags Online

After entering the connection information on the main page of the addon, if you are connected to the OPC server computer, the addon allows for auto-discovery and tag selection. To do this, you select the Select Tags button at the top of the page. Use the GUI to select the desired tags. After selection is complete, the tags and folder structures will be added to the system definition.

NOTE: this is a one time copy. If the OPC server structures change, the tag structures will have to be updated as well.

NOTE: String data types are ignored as NI VeriStand doesn't support strings. Any folder with a "_" at the beginning is also ignored.

Add Tags Offline

From the OPC server, export the tag list(s) as csv files. In the add-on, select the Add Folder button from the top of the page. Name the page to match the parent folder in the OPC server by navigating to the new folder. While still on the new folder page, select the Import Tags button at the top of the page. Use the GUI to select your csv file. Then, select the desired tags. After selection is complete, the tags and folder structures will be added to the system definition.

NOTE: this is a one time copy. If the OPC server structures change, the tag structures will have to be updated as well.

NOTE: String data types are ignored as NI VeriStand doesn't support strings.

Delete multiple items

To delete multiple items, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete Multiple Items from the shortcut menu.
